name: Tommy Tsunami and the Zombie Salami
name_original: Tommy Tsunami and the Zombie Salami
description:
Survive the Zombies and Sharks while following along Tommy Tsunami in his quest for the fabled Salami! It will take guts and patience to set forth on this adventure! Join Tommy in this metroidvania / survival game!

A / Left Arrow = Move Left

D / Right Arrow  = Move Right

Space Bar = Jump
